channel.title: Wings Of Hope CBO
channel.description: Recent content on Wings Of Hope CBO

item.title: Impact of climate change on pastoralist communities
item.description: Climate change is a global phenomenon that is having a profound impact on communities around the world, including pastoralist communities in Kenya’s arid and semi-arid environments.

item.title: The status of Girl child education in arid and semi-arid regions of Kenya
item.description: Girl child education in Kenya’s arid and semi-arid lands has long been a challenge, with many girls facing a range of barriers to accessing quality education.

item.title: Alternative means of livelihood for pastoral communities in Kenya
item.description: Pastoralist communities in Kenya have long relied on keeping cattle as their primary means of livelihood.
